{"rule":"A_UNCOUNTABLE","sentence":"^\\Q[365]Sartre To be looked at is to grasp oneself as the unknown object of unknowable assessments, and in particular, evaluative accessments being seen constitutes me as a defenceless being for a freedom that is not my own.\\E$"}
{"rule":"A_UNCOUNTABLE","sentence":"^\\QThus, my being is not only contingent on the basis of my own non-being – but my being is contingent on the basis of a freedom that is both outside of me, and fundamentally inaccessible to me.\\E$"}
